Episodes.Title: Chapter 27
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank's approval ratings have plummeted. Doug goes through rehab over his injury. Claire plans to run for Ambassador to the U.N.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 28
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Claire's U.N. bid runs into trouble. Frank fights off mutiny with a bold address to the country.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 29
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The Russian president's state visit becomes a cold war of wills.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 30
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Claire bypasses Russia at the U.N. Frank tries to outmaneuver a potential challenger and ends up face to face with a higher power.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 31
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank declares war on Congress to jump-start his jobs program. Claire spars with the Russian Ambassador.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 32
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank and Claire travel to Moscow to negotiate the return of an imprisoned U.S. citizen. Claire takes a stand that jeopardizes their plans.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 33
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The damage is done and the Underwoods must repair it. But deep wounds don't heal fast, and sometimes not at all.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 34
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: A hurricane endangers more than just the entire East Coast and Frank must make a difficult choice.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 35
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos just as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets disturbing intel and counsels him.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 36
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank needs to deal with Petrov one on one, while Claire tries to preserve the peace-keeping mission. Sacrifices must be made.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 37
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Things turn ugly when Frank, Jackie, and Heather square off during their first debate. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 38
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Claire is given an even larger role in the campaign. The gain in points drives Heather to look for dirt on Claire.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 39
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Francis and Claire's relationship reaches a critical point. Doug catches up with his past.
